message: This is a high-quality product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000. I'm a reputable seller, and I'm confident you'll be satisfied with this purchase.
Thank you for your confidence, Alice. I trust your assessment and will proceed with the purchase.

I want to be transparent with you. This product is not as good as the previous one. However, I'm still willing to sell it to you for $10000. I'm willing to take a loss on this one, but I believe it's a fair price considering its value. I'm hoping you'll take a chance on it.
I appreciate your honesty, Alice. Given the price and the fact that you're taking a loss, I'm willing to take the risk and make the purchase.

I'm glad you took a chance on the previous product! This one is also a high-quality product, and I'm confident you'll be happy with it. However, I want to make it clear that I'm not willing to sell it to you for $10000 this time. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $5000. I think this is a fair price considering the value you've already received from the previous two purchases.
Thank you for the offer, Alice, but I'm not comfortable making a purchase at $5000 for this product. I'll pass on this opportunity.

I understand your hesitation, Bob. I want to assure you that this product is indeed high-quality, and it's a great opportunity for you to get another excellent product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000, the same price as the first product. I believe this price reflects its true value, and I'm confident you'll be happy with the purchase. If you're still unsure, I'd be happy to provide more information about the product's features and benefits.
Thank you for the reassurance, Alice. Based on your confidence in the product and the price, I'm ready to make the purchase.

I'm glad you're willing to give me the benefit of the doubt, Bob! However, I want to make it clear that I'm not going to offer you a discount on this product. I believe it's worth the full $10000, and I'm confident you'll agree once you see its features and benefits. But I'll give you a unique opportunity to 'test' the product before buying it. If you buy it and don't like it, I'll give you a 'free' upgrade to a better product of your choice from my inventory. This way, you can try before you commit.
That sounds like a fair deal, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to test the product first. I'll go ahead and make the purchase.

I appreciate the guarantee, Alice. It shows your confidence in the product and your willingness to stand behind it. I'll take advantage of this risk-free opportunity and make the purchase.
